rukus.text: Abraham said ‘‘Lord, make this¹ land secure. Preserve me and my descendants from serving idols
Lord, many have they led astray. He that follows me shall become my brother, and if anyone turns against me, You are surely forgiving and compassionate

Lord, I have settled some of my offspring in a barren valley near Your Sacred House, so that they may observe true worship, Lord. Put in some people‘s hearts kindness towards them, and provide them with the earth‘s fruits; perchance they will give thanks
Lord, You have knowledge of all that we conceal and all that we reveal: nothing on earth or in heaven can be concealed from God
Praise be to God who has bestowed on me Ishmael and Isaac despite my old age! My Lord well hears all prayers
Lord, make me and my descendants steadfast in prayer. Lord, accept my prayer
‘Forgive me, Lord, and forgive my parents and all the faithful on the Day of Reckoning.‘
